DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : I . Estimate overall survival confirm unconfirmed complete partial response patient unresectable malignant mesothelioma pleura treat gemcitabine plus cisplatin . II . Evaluate qualitative quantitative toxicity regimen patient population . OUTLINE : Patients receive gemcitabine IV 30 minute , immediately follow cisplatin IV 30 minute day 1 , 8 , 15 . Courses repeat every 28 day . Treatment continue absence unacceptable toxicity disease progression . Patients complete response receive 2 additional course therapy . Patients follow every 6 month death . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 50 patient accrue study within 25 month .
